translations: v.俯卧；拜倒；屈服（prostrate 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 虚弱的, 是什么意思及音标

sentences.sentence: How dare you act wildly in my site? I will let you prostrating.
sentences.translation: 你竟敢在我的地盘撒野？我让你吃不了兜着走！

sentences.sentence: Just the act of bowing and prostrating with your face flat on the floor removes all the trappings of this life.
sentences.translation: 它仅仅是以鞠躬和面部叩地的动作消除一生的装饰。

sentences.sentence: He came to her, fell at her knees, and slowly prostrating himself, he took the tip of her foot which peeped out from beneath her robe, and kissed it.
sentences.translation: 他向她走去，跪在她跟前，又慢慢伏下去，抓住她露在裙袍边上的脚尖，吻着它。
